title: 分享官方我的世界MC下载地址。
txt_content:
本帖最后由 422976313 于 2014-8-27 11:30 编辑 

下载地址：点这里

DownloadWhen you have bought the game, you can download the stand-alone launcher for Minecraft here. It will automatically update the game files with the latest version. You'll be able to play the game without an Internet connection if you've been online at least once.Minecraft for WindowsDownload Minecraft.exe. If given the option, save the file instead of running it. Save the file anywhere you'd like, then double-click the program to run.
Show all platformsThe Minecraft launcher was updated 01 July 2013. To get latest version of the game, make sure that you have downloaded the latest version of the launcher from the link above.Multiplayer ServerIf you're running on Windows and just want to set up a server easily, downloadminecraft_server.1.7.10.exe and run it.If you want to run the server on any other OS or without GUI it's a bit more involved (seethis wiki article for a tutorial). First make sure you can use java from the command line. On Linux and Mac OS X this should already be set up but on Windows you might have to tinker with the PATH environment variable. Download and run minecraft_server.1.7.10.jar with java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar nogui.
翻译：
下载
当你购买这款游戏，你可以下载启动器了，它会自动更新游戏到最新版本，你可以离线玩，但是你必须保证它以前连过互联网。

下载我的世界WINDOWS版：
下载 MIECRAFT，如果需要设置，请勿在运行之后保存，你可以将文件保存在任何你喜欢的位置，双击它即可运行。

展示所有提纲：
我的世界启动器的最新版本是2013年7月1号。它能自动下载最新版本的游戏，请确定最新的版本出现在启动器中。
